data.title: adidas Skateboarding Away Days Trailer
data.description:
adidas Skateboarding presents the official trailer for its highly anticipated first full-length feature skate film showcasing the Global & Int’l team. World Premiere Tour - May 2016

Director: Matt Irving

Co-Creator: Jascha Muller

Global Team:
Mark Gonzales, Dennis Busenitz, Silas Baxter-Neal, Lucas Puig, Rodrigo TX, Mark Suciu, Pete Eldridge, Benny Fairfax, Nestor Judkins, Jake Donnelly, Lem Villemin, Jack Fardell, Alec Majerus, Miles Silvas, Na-kel Smith & Tyshawn Jones

Int'l Team:
Chewy Cannon (GBR), Raul Navarro (ESP), Günes Özdogan (SWE), Klaus Bohms (BRA), Kevin Lowry (CAN), Dennis, Durrant (AUS) & Gustav Tønnesen (NOR)

Filmers:
Chris Mulhern, Torsten Frank & Justin Albert

Photographers:
Sem Rubio & Zander Taketomo

#adidasSkateboarding
#AwayDays

data.title: Julia Lipnitskaya: Here To Create - adidas
data.description:
Creativity fuels reinvention. At just 17 years old, Julia is a gold medal winning figure skater. After experiencing huge success at a young age, she is maturing from her past, redefining her new sport style, personality and self. Julia Lipnitskaya is here to create.



From the World Cup pitches to the Olympic bobsleigh ice tracks, from the swagger of the sidewalk to the strut of the catwalk, from the NBA All Stars to concert stages, adidas supports and encourages the love of the game -- no matter the game.
 
adidas sponsors many of the world's best athletes and icons, including:
 
James Harden, Caroline Wozniaki, Gareth Bale, Demarco Murray, Jessica Ennis-Hill, Robert Griffin III, Derrick Rose, Angelique Kerber, Jeremy Scott, Sachin Tendulkar, Leo Messi, Kanye West, Zinedine Zidane, David Beckham, Dan Carter, Rita Ora, Mark Gonzales, Snoop Dogg, Novak Djokovic, Yohan Blake and Damian Lillard.
 
adidas also has partnerships with many of the world's best teams and leagues, including:
 
Chelsea FC, FC Bayern Munchen, AC Milan, Real Madrid CF, Manchester United FC, CR Flamengo, Juventus FC, England Cricket team, All Blacks rugby and the British & Irish Lions.

data.title: Jaqueline Carvalho: Here To Create - adidas
data.description:
The enemy of creativity is fear. Jaque, one of the top-performing and most widely-loved Brazilian volleyball players of all time, plays with reckless abandon to create amazing plays and wins, resulting in countless injuries and long periods of rehabilitation. She has shown nothing but perseverance and dedication to her sport, playing without fear to create wins for herself, her team, and her country. Jaqueline Carvalho is here to create.

-------------------

data.title: adidas tennis -- ready to #smashthesilence
data.description:
It's the voice inside you that gets drowned by 120 heartbeats a minute. It is the silence before the game that is smashed by the cheering of thousands and thousands of people. It is a life lecture that tells you not to stop now. It's the smallest thing but also the biggest. Make them stop breathing and blow them away. 

Tennis is for those who will never be silenced.
Scream -- with pain and with joy.
Stay hungry -- for the victory and shouting.

Everyone knows:
Only those who are quiet will be forgotten. But tennis never forgets.

Are you ready to smash the silence?

data.title: Futurecraft Tailored Fibre - adidas
data.description:
This is Futurecraft. Cutting-edge craftsmanship for a revolutionary run. Tailored for you, by you.

Introducing Futurecraft Tailored Fibre, a revolutionary manufacturing technique that enables unique footwear designs to be modified to the individual needs of any athlete.

The new prototype is the next development in our obsession to allow athletes to improve through a combination of the craft of shoemaking and cutting edge technology. The machinery used allows for the look and feel of a running shoe to be completely changed with the fibres used in production being tailored around the foot.

-------------------

From the World Cup pitches to the Olympic bobsleigh ice tracks, from the swagger of the sidewalk to the strut of the catwalk, from the NBA All Stars to concert stages, adidas supports and encourages the love of the game -- no matter the game.
 
adidas sponsors many of the world's best athletes and icons, including:
 
James Harden, Caroline Wozniaki, Gareth Bale, Demarco Murray, Jessica Ennis-Hill, Robert Griffin III, Derrick Rose, Angelique Kerber, Jeremy Scott, Sachin Tendulkar, Leo Messi, Kanye West, Zinedine Zidane, David Beckham, Dan Carter, Rita Ora, Mark Gonzales, Snoop Dogg, Novak Djokovic, Yohan Blake and Damian Lillard.
 
adidas also has partnerships with many of the world's best teams and leagues, including:
 
Chelsea FC, FC Bayern Munchen, AC Milan, Real Madrid CF, Manchester United FC, CR Flamengo, Juventus FC, England Cricket team, All Blacks rugby and the British & Irish Lions.

data.title: adidas: Arthur Zanetti - It's Forever or Never
data.description:
adidas celebrates sports and pays homage to the “Wonderful City”, Rio de Janeiro, in a video with Arthur Zanetti, adidas’s artistic gymnastic champion. 

“Pure talent”, “gifted”, “sports legend”, “prodigy”. If you believe in any of these... if you believe in being "born skilled", one thing’s for sure: you know nothing about what it takes to reach true athleticism.

If you know what sports are, you understand the meaning of dedication, determination, repetition, effort, listening to your coach, taking criticism, working hard, training, training more, overcoming limits, giving your best and taking every challenge as if it was forever or never. 

Amidst the setting of Rio de Janeiro, we celebrate sports with a Brazilian athlete training in the most unusual spot, the Pão de Açucar (Sugar Loaf). 

Direction: 
Luigi Cani  
Mikael Santiago 
Caio Amato 
 
Executive Production:

asset.title: adidas: Arthur Zanetti - It's Forever or Never
asset.description:
adidas celebrates sports and pays homage to the “Wonderful City”, Rio de Janeiro, in a video with Arthur Zanetti, adidas’s artistic gymnastic champion. 

“Pure talent”, “gifted”, “sports legend”, “prodigy”. If you believe in any of these... if you believe in being "born skilled", one thing’s for sure: you know nothing about what it takes to reach true athleticism.

If you know what sports are, you understand the meaning of dedication, determination, repetition, effort, listening to your coach, taking criticism, working hard, training, training more, overcoming limits, giving your best and taking every challenge as if it was forever or never. 

Amidst the setting of Rio de Janeiro, we celebrate sports with a Brazilian athlete training in the most unusual spot, the Pão de Açucar (Sugar Loaf). 

Follow adidas online: 

http://www.youtube.com/adidas

http://www.instagram.com/adidasbrasil

http://www.facebook.com/adidasBR

Direction:

Caio Amato

data.title: adidas: Futurecraft 3D
data.description:
For creators. By creators. This is Futurecraft 3D.

It is our approach. It is our direction. It is our journey. Futurecraft 3D is a prototype and a statement of intent. We have developed proprietary 3D printing technology, delivering a “first of its kind” product in an entirely new way. Our 3D-printed material not only allows us to make a great running shoe, but also to use performance data to drive truly bespoke experiences, meeting the needs of any athlete. 

Creating something totally new is a journey, and we’re excited to have you come along with us.

data.title: adidas: Mayra Aguiar – It's Forever or Never
data.description:
Make a move or move out of the way. 

adidas celebrates sports and athletes in a series of “It's Forever or Never” films. Here we have the Brazilian judoka Mayra Aguiar, who has already depicted her talent on mats in Paris, London, Tokyo, Guadalajara, Toronto and more. Watch and you’ll see her in a unique experience in her own country, Brazil, training on the top of the mountain Pedra da Gávea, in Rio de Janeiro. 

The mat at Pedra da Gávea may be something new to Mayra, but she has been training since she was 6 years old. By the age of 11, she had already started the routine of two training sessions a day, six days a week.  

Video Credits:

Luigi Cani 
Mikael Santiago 
Caio Amato

data.title: adidas: Futurecraft Leather
data.description:
For creators. By creators. This is Futurecraft Leather.

It is our approach. It is our direction. It is our journey.
Futurecraft Leather is a prototype and a statement of intent. By reimagining how to work with leather, a material that is synonymous with the adidas brand, we have created a “first of its kind” product in an entirely new way. Milling leather allows us to push the limits of our craft, bringing new form and function to a traditional material.

This new innovation meets a true adidas Originals icon, in the form of the Superstar. With just 45 pairs available worldwide, Futurecraft Leather is an homage to the Superstar’s years since its inception.

data.title: adidas: Errejota - Ready for Rio
data.description:
Created for Rio. Ready to take on the world. Next year belongs to Errejota. #BeTheDifference

If Brazil is the country of football, Rio de Janeiro is the football capital. Whether you play to unwind or to overcome your opponents in the most important match of your life, bring the chaos and enjoy the beauty and complexity of the city. 

adidas teams include: Chelsea FC, Manchester United FC, FC Bayern München, AC Milan, Juventus F.C., Real Madrid C.F., AFC Ajax, Bayer Leverkusen, FC Basel 1893, FC Kobenhaven, and FC Schalke 04. 

adidas sponsor some of the best footballers in the world including: Leo Messi, Luis Suárez, James Rodríguez, Gareth Bale, Arjen Robben, Müller, Özil, Oscar, Neuer, Diego Costa, Juan Mata, Benzema, Kroos, Marcelo.

Soundtrack: João Brasil – Errejota no Comando (feat. Nego do Borel)

Video Credits: 
Production company: Hardcuore
Creative, Direction & Script: Breno Pineschi e Rafael Cazes (Hardcuore)
Photography Director: Pedro Cardillo
Executive production: Renata Garcia
Production assistent: Fernanda Nakamura
Production Director: Brenda da Mata
Editing: Léo Gouvea //  Sacha Bastos

data.title: adidas: Creators Never Follow – Damian Lillard
data.description: Damian Lillard has been silencing doubters since day one. You can follow what they say about you — or use it as motivation to create your own game.
